item.title: 欧佩克+"代表称将七月产量呼吁提前一天至 5 月 31 日
item.description: 代表们说，"欧佩克+"将决定八个主要成员国 7 月份石油产量水平的视频会议提前一天到 5 月 31 日举行。【原文：OPEC+ brought forward a video-conference that will decide July oil production levels for eight key members by one day to May 31, delegates said.】

item.title: 苏里南大选陷入僵局，新发现的石油财富岌岌可危
item.description: 苏里南两大政党在周日的选举中几乎打成平手，这引发了激烈的联合谈判，以决定谁将管理即将到来的石油财富，苏里南的政治前途岌岌可危。【原文：Suriname’s political future hangs in the balance after the two main parties were virtually tied in Sunday’s election, triggering intense coalition talks to determine who will get to manage the upcoming oil bonanza.】

item.title: 大一生命认为日本国债市场波动性将在年底前降低
item.description: 日本最大的上市人寿保险公司第一生命控股公司（Dai-ichi Life Holdings Inc.【原文：The surging bond yields that have saddled Japan’s insurers with billions of dollars in unrealized losses will weaken because they are not supported by economic fundamentals, according to Dai-ichi Life Holdings Inc., the country’s largest listed life insurer.】

item.title: IndiGo 的 Gangwal 寻求从股票出售中获得 8.03 亿美元，条款显示
item.description: 印度最大航空公司 IndiGo 的联合创始人拉克什-甘瓦尔（Rakesh Gangwal）及其家族信托基金正在寻求从出售该航空公司 3.4% 的股份中获得高达 8.03 亿美元的资金，这位亿万富翁还在继续减持其在运营商 InterGlobe Aviation Ltd. 的股份。【原文：Rakesh Gangwal, the co-founder of India’s largest airline IndiGo, and his family trust are seeking as much as $803 million from the sale of 3.4% stake in the carrier, as the billionaire continues to reduce his holding in operator InterGlobe Aviation Ltd.】

item.title: 欧盟命令 Shein 处理违反消费者权益法的行为，否则将面临罚款
item.description: 欧盟监管机构警告总部位于新加坡的电子商务公司Shein Group Ltd.，如果不打击其平台上违反消费者保护规定的行为，就可能面临罚款。【原文：Shein Group Ltd., the Singapore-based e-commerce firm, was warned by European Union regulators it could face fines unless it clamps down on consumer protection violations on its platform.】

item.title: 拉加德加倍努力提升欧元的全球形象
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统反复无常的政策为加强欧元的国际作用提供了一个 "绝佳机会"，使欧元货币集团能够享有更多迄今为止只属于美国的特权。【原文：President Donald Trump’s erratic policies offer a “prime opportunity” to strengthen the euro’s international role and allow the currency bloc to enjoy more of the privileges so far reserved for the US, European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said.】

item.title: 印度 NSE 出价 1.18 亿美元解决 Sebi 案，重启 IPO
item.description: 据一位参与商讨的人士透露，印度国家证券交易所有限公司（National Stock Exchange of India Ltd.）据说将提供创纪录的约 100 亿卢比（约合 1.18 亿美元）的资金，以解决与该国市场监管机构之间的长期争端，这很可能为其公开上市铺平道路。【原文：The National Stock Exchange of India Ltd. is said to be offering a record amount of about 10 billion rupees ($118 million) to settle a longstanding dispute with the country’s market regulator, according to a person involved in the discussions, likely paving the way for its public listing.】

item.title: 通胀飙升，加沙战争升级，以色列维持利率不变
item.description: 以色列中央银行连续第 11 次维持利率不变，在加沙军事行动增加和通货膨胀率上升的情况下保持观望立场。【原文：Israel’s central bank kept interest rates on hold for the 11th time in a row, maintaining a wait-and-see stance amid increased military operations in Gaza and an uptick in inflation.】

item.title: 石油暴跌和贸易战导致加拿大西部钻井用地销售下降
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战和欧佩克+的增产打击了原油价格，加拿大西部石油中心阿尔伯塔省的钻井权销售热潮正在消退。【原文：A boom in sales of drilling rights in western Canada’s oil heartland of Alberta is fading as US President Donald Trump’s trade war and OPEC+ production increases hammer crude prices.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯计划结束企业集团时代，谋求扭亏为盈
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯股份公司（Thyssenkrupp AG）计划转型为一家控股公司，拥有独立业务单位的多数股权，这标志着其作为完全一体化工业集团的时代即将结束。【原文：Thyssenkrupp AG plans to transform itself into a holding company with majority stakes in standalone business units, marking the end of its era as a fully integrated industrial conglomerate.】

item.title: 巴里克称马里收购金矿缺乏法律依据
item.description: 巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp.【原文：Barrick Mining Corp. said Mali’s request to put the company’s gold operations in the West African country into provisional administration has no legal justification.】

item.title: 挪威国家银行将主动型基金经理霍尔贝格出售给挪威亿万富翁
item.description: 挪威国家银行（DNB Bank ASA）的投资银行部门将其持有的主动型基金管理公司霍尔贝格（Holberg）的股份出售给挪威亿万富翁克里斯汀-斯维亚斯（Christen Sveaas）的投资公司Kistefos AS，出售金额未披露。【原文：DNB Bank ASA’s investment banking unit sold its stake in active fund manager Holberg to Kistefos AS, the investment company of Norwegian billionaire Christen Sveaas, for an undisclosed amount.】

item.title: 大型矿商希望新鲜血液解决老问题
item.description:
该行业正在涌现新的领导者。但这可能还不足以说服信心不足的投资者。【原文：

item.title: 特朗普关税紧张局势加剧，中欧贸易首脑将会晤
item.description: 欧盟和中国的高级贸易官员计划于下月初再次会晤，这再次表明双方都在加强接触，试图回击唐纳德-特朗普施加的关税压力。【原文：Top trade officials from the European Union and China are planning to meet again early next month, another sign that both sides are stepping up engagements as they try to push back against tariff pressure from Donald Trump.】

item.title: 丹麦能源交易商 InCommodities 放眼亚洲拓展电力业务
item.description: 由高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：InCommodities A/S, the Danish energy trader backed by Goldman Sachs Group Inc., plans to expand further in Asia this year to tap developing electricity markets there.】

item.title: ChatGPT 的内存改进指向更个性化的人工智能
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社的全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，奥斯汀-卡尔（Austin Carr）将报道最近宣布的对主要消费者聊天机器人的改进，这些改进使它们更容易了解用户。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Austin Carr reports on the improvements recently announced to the major consumer chatbots that have made it easier for them to know more about their users.】

item.title: 穆迪重新考虑对七国集团的评级范围
item.description: 我是克雷格-斯特林（Craig Stirling），法兰克福资深编辑。今天我们关注穆迪对意大利看法的转变。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Craig Stirling, a senior editor in Frankfurt. Today we’re looking the shift in view by Moody’s on Italy. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 瑞士对特朗普贸易协议的渴望考验着它对农民的爱
item.description: 英国可能是第一个与美国达成某种贸易协议的国家，但瑞士有理由希望自己不会落后太多。本月早些时候，财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，两国都 "走在 "达成协议的 "队列前列"。【原文：The UK may have been first to clinch some sort of trade accord with the US, but Switzerland has reason to hope it’s not far behind. Earlier this month, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said both countries were “at the front of the queue” for a deal.】

item.title: 印度钢铁大亨重新开启莫桑比克煤炭交易之路
item.description: 在卖方从莫桑比克新政府收回特许权后，印度最大的钢铁制造商可以继续收购该国的一个煤矿。【原文：India’s largest steelmaker can proceed with the acquisition of a coal deposit in Mozambique after the seller recovered the concession rights from the country’s new government.】

item.title: 香港宽带行政总裁称中国移动收购要约低估了公司价值
item.description: 据香港宽带供应商的高层管理人员称，中国移动有限公司对香港宽带有限公司的收购要约低估了该公司的价值。【原文：China Mobile Ltd.’s takeover offer for HKBN Ltd. undervalues the company, according to the Hong Kong broadband provider’s top executive.】

item.title: 匈牙利警告加薪计划面临经济疲软风险
item.description: 匈牙利政府警告说，由于经济增长逊于预期，可能需要重新谈判计划于 2026 年提高最低工资的问题，这是政府官员对经济前景作出的最新的消极展望。【原文：Hungary’s government warned it may need to renegotiate minimum wage hikes planned for 2026 due to weaker-than-expected growth, in the latest downbeat economic outlook from officials.】

item.title: 中国提高对主要银行跨境使用人民币的要求
item.description: 中国央行要求其主要贷款机构在促进跨境贸易时提高人民币的份额，这是在全球应对美国关税冲击之际，中国央行对人民币使用的最新推动。【原文：China’s central bank asked its major lenders to raise the share of yuan when facilitating cross-border trade, in its latest push for the use of the currency as the world grapples with the onslaught of tariffs by the US.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚提高流动性以平息利率飙升后的市场波动
item.description: 罗马尼亚中央银行向国内市场注入了近七年来最高的流动性，以降低因近期政治动荡而飙升的短期利率。【原文：Romania’s central bank injected the highest amount of liquidity to the domestic market in almost seven years as it sought to bring down short-term interest rates that spiked because of recent political turmoil.】

item.title: 印度首次推出新天气模型帮助农业和洪水规划
item.description: 今年西南季风提前抵达印度，这对农作物来说是个好消息，但未来几个月降雨的具体时间、地点和降雨量仍是难以回答的问题。【原文：The southwest monsoon’s early arrival in India this year is good news for crops, but exactly when, where, and how much rain will fall over the next few months are still difficult questions to answer.】

item.title: 美团在全球扩张中实现销售额稳健增长
item.description: 美团积极进军中国大陆以外的新市场，上一季度的销售额好于预期。【原文：Meituan reported better-than-expected sales in the past quarter after an aggressive push into new markets outside mainland China.】

item.title: 龙巴欧迪与丰隆银行联手打造东南亚财富管理平台
item.description: 瑞士财富管理公司隆巴欧迪（Lombard Odier）与丰隆银行（Hong Leong Bank Bhd.【原文：Lombard Odier struck its seventh partnership in Asia as the Swiss wealth manager tied up with Hong Leong Bank Bhd., a move that underscores how financial firms are expanding to cater to the rising wealth in the region.】

item.title: 西姆库斯称欧洲央行面临通胀率低于 2% 的更大风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员吉迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，通货膨胀率达不到该行 2% 的目标的危险越来越大。【原文：There’s a growing danger that inflation will fall short of the European Central Bank’s 2% target, according to Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus.】

item.title: 奇货可居：分配者为何青睐多策略对冲基金（播客）
item.description: 随着大型资产配置者向千禧年（Millennium）和 Citadel 等公司投入数十亿美元，多策略对冲基金的发展势头迅猛。鉴于这种增长势头，多策略基金之间也在争夺人才。但究竟为什么大投资者似乎如此钟爱多层次基金呢？究竟是什么让多层次基金成为投资对象？费用和报酬又是如何计算的？在本期节目中，我们采访了阿尔本合伙人公司（Albourne Partners）的合伙人罗南-科斯格雷夫（Ronan Cosgrave）。【原文：Multi-strategy hedge funds have been having a moment with big asset allocators pouring billions of dollars into names like Millennium and Citadel. And given all the growth, multi-strat funds have also been battling each other for talent. But why, exactly, do big investors seem to love multi-strats so much? What actually makes a multi-strat good to invest in? And how do fees and compensation work? In this episode, we speak with Ronan Cosgrave, a partner at Albourne Partners, which advises institu】

item.title: 德国 "强烈 "敦促基金公开国防投资
item.description: 德国金融监管机构敦促资产管理公司在向市场推广的可持续基金增持国防资产时保持透明，因为人们担心此类持仓的突然增加可能会让一些客户感到不安。【原文：Germany’s financial watchdog is urging asset managers to be transparent about adding defense holdings to funds marketed as sustainable, amid concerns a sudden rise in such positions may upset some clients.】
